law.catch_line: Association of producers not illegal or in restraint of trade.
law.text: No association meeting or activity undertaken to carry out the provisions of KRS 247.7900 to 247.7928 and intended to benefit all of the producers, handlers, and processors of porcine animals shall be deemed or considered illegal or in restraint of trade.
law.history: Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 2, sec. 2, effective July 13, 2004.
